Reference to an existing Worktag Type used as dimension by which the basis is calculated - for example, we can allocate $1,000 based on the ledger balance for each cost center and region (where the dimensions were cost center and region). This gets populated if Allocation Basis Type is 'Ledger Accounts'

Reference to an existing Worktag Type used to group the basis. Example when allocating between Cost Centers within a Region. Group by will sum per Region and allocate the total sum per Region between the cost centers within the region.
